levels.description: Immediately gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP; Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage <@ba.vup>twice</> to up to 6 nearby enemies and <$ba.stun>Stuns</> them for <@ba.vup>{stun}</> seconds. Allied units within Attack Range gain <@ba.vup>{flamtl_s_2.prob:0%}</> Physical Dodge for <@ba.vup>{flamtl_s_2.duration}</> seconds
